page.title: 06CLUBS, KING'S NYMPTON
page.content: {TODDLER AND PARENT GROUP}meets weekly in Church Hall.Children learn social skills and parents share common experiences and problems. {JUNIOR MISSIONARY ASSOCIATION}has open membership for children from 7 to 14 years.Organised by Methodist Church. {PARENT-TEACHER ASSOCIATION}for local Primary School.Fosters good home -school relationships.Fund raising activities for educational resources. {WOMEN'S INSTITUTE }Present membership 20.Meets monthly in Primary School. Affiliated to N.F.W.I.{ {YOUTH CLUB }caters for young people of 9 and upwards.Meets in Church Hall and makes regular visits to North Devon Leisure Centre. {METHODIST WOMEN'S FELLOWSHIP }Open membership.Meets fortnightly in Methodist Sunday School. {SENIOR CITIZEN'S CLUB}Social meetings.
